lenders.name: Vickie
lenders.loan_because: I've always wanted to give back, but never found a way that worked with my lifestyle until hearing about Kiva on the Oprah show.  I love the concept of Kiva and I am looking forward to being instrumental in helping someone achieve their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I configure and deploy network equipment which allows workers throughout the Pentagon to communicate inside and outside of their organizations to include internet access.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: ...it's the gift that keeps on giving. I can give in a way that is measurable and repeatable. Plus, I get to direct the funds to the groups/individuals/cause that resonate the most with me. It feels like a better model than the ones where you give and no idea what become of those funds.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in order to travel and I travel to explore and learn.

lenders.name: Dau
lenders.loan_because: My Son sent me an invitation and and now I must do my part.

lenders.name: Lovans
lenders.occupation: Community development and Youth Coordinator - Ghan

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: Kiva provides access to helping an individual or a small group. Making small loans helps me live out the reality that small acts of love and care can change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Christian minister, working in a children's hospital, providing spiritual care to patients and families.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: i was so fortunate to be born in America where anything is possible.  I would like to make that possibility available  to other people.

lenders.name: renee
lenders.loan_because: people are empowered by their own abilities to manage and provide for their families and communities.

lenders.name: Maia
lenders.loan_because: I have access to an extraordinary amount of resources as a Western person. That needs to be distributed fairly and I want to help do that.
lenders.occupational_info: I work the land, just like most people on this planet.

lenders.name: Kris
lenders.loan_because: people need help.

lenders.name: Sylvester and Roxanne Brown
lenders.loan_because: because I believe that we are the world and we are the people , so I want to start by trying to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: Owner Outpatient Mental Heath Clinic

lenders.name: IreneBee
lenders.loan_because: like making a donation, if you can give/help, you should. It's human to.

lenders.name: Mike & Tara
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a GREAT tool to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Ana
lenders.loan_because: I read The Banker of The Poor book by Yunus and I am fascinated by idea

lenders.name: Lycka
lenders.loan_because: To give those the opportunitie that we take for granted.
lenders.occupational_info: Bunch of happy people working within research, media, hotel, IT.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because:
I want to make the world better by building transnational, grass roots connections so that people everywhere can feel that we are all working together as a species (regardless of race, religion or nationality). 

I think that one way I can do my part  is giving interest free loans to people who are working hard to build better lives for themselves, their families and their local communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the General Manager of a processed fruit product importer/distributor. We buy juice concentrates, purees and essences from processors around the world. We warehouse and sell repacked, blended or as is products to food manufacturers that use the items that we carry, mostly in less than truckload quantities.

lenders.name: Priscilla
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to make a difference in someone's life across the world and I believe in people! :-)

lenders.name: Anja and Oren
lenders.occupation: Making the world a better place.

lenders.name: Shelly
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we are all called to give. I love this program for the way that it provides opportunity to help others in a way that teaches responsibility and preserves dignity.

lenders.name: nada
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people who can start a business or improve an existing one to better their life. I know that maybe alone I can't make a huge difference but together people contributing to the same cause can, and do make the difference needed.

lenders.name: Richard Anderson
lenders.occupational_info: I train engineers to be better salespeople.

lenders.name: Amit
lenders.loan_because: This life is short, the vanities of the world are transient, but they alone live who live for others, the rest are more dead than alive. - Swami Vivekananda.
lenders.occupational_info: Maintaining and Supportiong Computer Applications.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way for an individual to make a positive impact on other people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who donate blood platelets.

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back from all the good I have received.  I want to leave the world a better place, especially for my children.  Inspriations like Buddha, Mother Teresa, Gandhi, MLK, Jr.
lenders.occupational_info: I work basically like an anesthesiologist. I put people asleep for surgery and keep them out of pain.  I LOVE my work!  Only 6 more months left until graduation! ;)

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: Resources are abundant, but it's the way they are allocated that influences people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses reduce the level of uncertainty surrounding the decisions they need to make.

lenders.name: Veronica
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I want the future to be bright for my son and the children of others.  I believe that economic stability fosters domestic harmony and growth, which can lead to regional stability and peace.
lenders.occupational_info: I prepare and review papers that allow companies to work with each other and the government.

lenders.name: AT & Lizzie Light
lenders.loan_because: Unfortunately, it's the only way we can help these people.  For now.

lenders.name: Jaime
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in people's lives.

lenders.name: Patti
lenders.loan_because: A small loan makes such a large difference in the lives of the borrowers.  We have so many blessings and God wants us to share them, so we are.  Everyone should do this.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked in International sales for many years and then I was a realtor for 9 years.  After that, I retired to raise my children, teach classes, drive on field trips, etc.  I am very blessed with a wonderful family and friends.

lenders.name: Cliff & Erin
lenders.loan_because: We want to bless others!

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be born in a country with unlimited opportunity, and I want to help those that do not have access to the simple things in life that we here in America take for granted.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for companies through the debt capital markets.

lenders.name: Brigitte
lenders.loan_because: I am a women entrepreneur and I know how good it feels when you own your own business so I want to help another woman realize her dream company.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional Photographer that specialized in Dog Photography. Family hires me to take portrait of their furry family member.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I want someone else to benefit from the windfall I received.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the frozen food department at a grocery store.  When the product comes in I load it up on a cart and take to the aisle and put it away in the freezer  for customers to buy.  Brrrrrrr cold job!!!!!!

lenders.loan_because: it makes good sense

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I'm selfish. Helping others makes me happy.

lenders.name: Mrs. Joanne C. R.
lenders.loan_because: It's spiritually fulfilling.

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone become successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach art to children that wouldn't normally have the opportunity to learn about art.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is my duty to help those who seek to make better lives for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: It is my job to persuade members of the U.S. Congress and the Executive Branch to pass laws to promote greater use of renewable energy in the U.S.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: Poverty is a terrible disease.
lenders.occupational_info: Blood Banker

lenders.name: Lorraine
lenders.loan_because: The idea of helping people help themselves is a wonderful feeling and I am thrilled to be a small part of this organization!

lenders.name: Nicolette Lacson
lenders.loan_because: we can make a difference!

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I love to see how my loans can affect an aspiring entrepreneur on the other side of the world. The personal stories are inspiring!
lenders.occupational_info: I buy advertisements on the Internet in order to increase the number of visitors to my company's websites.

lenders.name: Katharine
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate your efforts and think you deserve help from those who have enough to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I consult with attorneys on medically-related lawsuits

lenders.name: Louise
lenders.loan_because: I want to share what I have

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I have been thinking about micro-loans for years and wondered how I could get directly involved. Kiva has provided that opportunity and I'm very thankful for it. I appreciate the direct connection between people that it provides.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with video, producing, editing and then creating DVDs. I also consult with companies and individuals on their media projects. I also teach video production to high school students part time.

lenders.name: Amberleigh
lenders.loan_because: its fun

lenders.name: Abby
lenders.loan_because: This is an amazing opportunity to be a part of positive change.  The recipients of these loans are all people who are empowering themselves to have a better life...and their hard work and entrepreneurial spirit is truly inspiring.

lenders.name: Anneke
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so many opportunities to have success and I want to pass that opportunity along to someone else.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I fell on hard times myself and was able to pull through with the help of friends and family.  Maybe my small contributions will be a blessing to others in need.

lenders.name: Sherrie
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people and seeing people improve their lives and their community.

lenders.name: Theodore
lenders.loan_because: I can help others to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep the computer systems up and running for a telecommunications company.

lenders.name: Brant
lenders.loan_because: I was once hungry, and was given the means to feed myself.

lenders.loan_because: every litle bit counts. What a great idea to lend to working people who just want to get their businesses off the ground.  Very inspring!

I help the children's drawing school.

I am so grateful for the people at KIVA for their webpage.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working to make the lives of animals better here in the United States. My staff and I help the homeless, unwanted and sometimes abused domestic animals in our community. We try to make sure none are being cruelly treated and we try to find homes for the ones that are homeless. I'm not sure how this will be received by those of you so much in need yourselves. I can only say that I hate to see any living creature (man or beast) suffering.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.occupation: Attorney; traveler (as often as day job allows)

lenders.occupational_info: well right now i am a student and once i get a job, i will try to benefit this society who has given us so much for so less.

We can't give amounts due to the bad economy but we give what can  knowing that we are helping someone who really needs it.

lenders.name: Maree
lenders.loan_because: When my husband was striken with cancer it was the kindness of strangers that kept a roof over our heads and helped us stay afloat and be there when he passed on. I teach my children that giving is important and paying it forward is essential to live a worthwhile life.
lenders.occupational_info: I create graphic designs and websites for business' and work from home where I can continue to be a good mom to my youngest who is a junior in high school. lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people and I can.

lenders.name: CHANTEL
lenders.loan_because: i wanted to help others

lenders.name: Karma G
lenders.loan_because: there are so many entrepreneurs in poverty who face serious capital constraints.  Because of poor access to capital many poor entrepreneurs must forego investments that have very short payback periods.  For example, if a shopkeeper can afford to buy more inventory her sales go up, her business expands, and she can pay back the loan very quickly.  Solving the problem of access to capital through microfinance is a very low cost way to help the very poor pull themselves out of poverty, educate their children, and feed their families.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family with a variety of occupations.  The dad teaches in a university, the mom teaches very young children with special needs, one daughter hires college students to work as teachers, one daughter works in Tanzania teaching young children about aids, and the youngest daughter is in her last year at High School.

My company took a chance on me by hiring me when I was young, not much experience, right out of school.  So that is why I want to give that same chance to you.  I am also trying to start a new business on the side, stained glass, to make extra money for my family.  So I understand how important it is to be self-sufficient and to be able to provide for my family.

lenders.occupational_info: My job is to sing songs about trucks and trains and love.

lenders.name: Lidya
lenders.loan_because: No one should be hungry.

lenders.name: L
lenders.loan_because: it's ridiculously easy and, as everybody knows, its easier to be a giver than a receiver. ;P
lenders.occupational_info: I help improve computer programs and devices used for medical purposes.

lenders.name: Siegwardt Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to and we understand how hard it is to start/run a business.
lenders.occupational_info: We make signs, banners, stickers, magnets and decals for schools, sporting groups, small businesses and individuals.

lenders.name: Yui
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves opportunity and I've been blessed with many.  To whom much is given, much is expected, and this is a small way in which I can hope to create big change.

lenders.name: Geoffrey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to be successful.  Kiva.org provides the vehicle for me to become a micro-angel investor.
lenders.occupational_info: I account for all the financial data in a manufacturing company in Southern California.

lenders.name: Jenn & Nelson
lenders.loan_because: We believe in leading by example.
lenders.occupational_info: We run a home based business that sells whole food supplements (vitamins) to individuals. We also help others to start their own home based business too. Nelson also works as a musician and teaches drums.

lenders.name: Thuy
lenders.loan_because:
It is great to be able to help others.
I am so thankful for Kiva organization.  Through Kiva, I can give others oppotunities to build businesses to generate income so that they provide for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked as an accountant for 11 yrs.  I was pretty good at it but I never thought that it was what I wanted to do for the rest of my life.  In 2010, I had an opportunity to get into real estate and found it very exiciting.  So I am now a real estate investor.  Check our my site.....

lenders.name: Kelley
lenders.loan_because: I admire these entrepreneurs. Their projects are exciting.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.occupational_info: 8 of these loans are from a class at the San Francisco State College of Business.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: It is a great feeling to help people work towards their goals.

lenders.name: daniela
lenders.loan_because: it feels amazing that such a small amount of money to us can be of so much aid to another family and help them get one step closer to getting out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently attending a local university and also work at a local restaurant part time.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great idea to help someone become independent and help those in need.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: A few years ago, I started my own business with an initial investment of about $250.  It hasn't exactly made me rich, but it's done well and I find the work far more rewarding than anything I'd done previously.  I firmly believe that anyone with the drive and entrepreneurial spirit to go into business for themselves should not be denied the opportunity for lack of startup capital.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and produce electronic devices, mostly for communications.

lenders.name: Irma & Jim
lenders.loan_because: We feel it's the responsibility of those who have to help those who have not.
lenders.occupational_info: Jim continues to create beautiful paintings and Irma knits; both LOVE to travel.

lenders.name: Kristy&Robert
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.  It's amazing what can happen if everyone gives just a little bit.  We are so grateful to be a part of this organization!

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: I want to help change the world.

lenders.name: Michael C.
lenders.loan_because: I wish for everyone the opportunity to succeed in their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in charge of buying medical supplies for a hospital.

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower people to succeed on their own.  Often, people just need a chance and an opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people get jobs by writing resumes that put them in the best possible light. Also, by helping them figure out the best way to search for a job.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my part, however small, to help improve the lives of others.  What goes around comes around!
lenders.occupational_info: I support families who have children with disabilities, helping them lead the life they want and deserve, giving them learning opportunities to become as independent as possible.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because:
"good people of the earth now can tell, there is no us and them."  

Melissa Etheridge

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with agencies who are in the process of getting new computer systems.  I help them design the system so it meets all of their needs.

lenders.name: maura
lenders.loan_because: As you humans, we all need to support each other.  When you empower someone with good, you change the world in a positive way.
lenders.occupational_info: In the advertising and marketing industry

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I would want others to do the same for me.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student and I work at a nonprofit that studies toxicology in whales.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: Just to reach out.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I am able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay home to take care of my children.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Billie Jo
lenders.loan_because: I want to bless others and show Gods love. It is the least I can do for Him after all He has done for each and everyone of us!
lenders.occupational_info: I stay home to raise my two children and take care of my husband while he goes out to his job everyday.

lenders.name: Marianela
lenders.loan_because: I like people

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can, and because if I can help somebody then it's only the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office. I am not in management, nor am I a supervisor or anyone's "boss". I help ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of my company's information and resources.

lenders.name: Diane & Don
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed and want to share our abundance with others.
lenders.occupational_info: Don is a consultant in the insurance industry.  Diane is a retired medical transcriptionist.

lenders.name: Ted
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others as others have helped me.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: Then the king will say to those at his right hand, 'Come, you that are blessed by my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world; for I was hungry and you gave me food, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you welcomed me, I was naked and you gave me clothing, I was sick and you took care of me, I was in prison and you visited me.'
lenders.occupational_info: Making Afghanistan a better place to live with the US Army!

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of being able to give someone a hand up, and to be able to do it again and again with a single loan.

lenders.name: Stephanie and Marley
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I feel so blessed and want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Loving, teaching, and raising my daughter Marley.

lenders.name: Steve & Jemma Copley
lenders.loan_because: We're lucky enough to be able to
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching children to become good global citizens (or at least think of others now and then!)

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I think and act both locally and globally to make my community and the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I own a photography business.  I am a retired social worker and human resources director.  We both volunteer in our community.

lenders.name: Nysha
lenders.loan_because: All that we give into the lives of others comes back into our own.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach skin care and color cosmetics. More importantly I teach women how to run a thriving business so that they can improve their lives and the lives of those they love.

lenders.name: Jen & John
lenders.loan_because: Trying to make the world a better place isn't just a possibility, it's an imperative.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to make sure healthcare is safe and effective for everyone.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in so many ways, so the least I can do is to help as many needy people as I can.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to do something for someone that needs a bit of a lift that could change their standard of living.
lenders.occupational_info: Protect Public funds of government
